No me encuentra ninguna partida, de ningun tipo. Solo puedo jugar offline con bots pero si busco una partida se puede tirar horas y horas y nada!!!!! No es mi ping, no es mi firewall, no es mi antivirus, no son los datos cache. AYUDA!!! POR FAVOR!!

O que é o CSGO ? Ahh, é um jogo maravilhoso lotado de hackers que não levam ban VAC simplesmente por usarem um hack PAGO. Sim, se você usa um hack pago, pode ficar tranquilo, não levará ban VAC. Por fim, o jogo ta praticamente abandonado na questão de hackers, as skins eles nao deixam de adicionar no jogo, jamais que eles querem perder dinheiro, mas cuidar dos hackers ? Pra que ? Deixa os players se fúder. 
Valve, vai tomar no seu cú

I used to be totally obssessed with this game, Loved it to bits. But lately the only thing I seem to do is either surf or 1v1. Look the game is good and all but its quality is getting ruined by valve with every update. Even though the system requirements are pretty small I would suggest you not to buy if you have a lower end GPU. Its playable but for CSGO you need a high fps to play properly. 

The reason why I am stopping playing csgo is becuase of many reasons: 

1. Toxic/Cancerous Community 
2. CSGO Gambling 
3. Shit performance on my dedicated card 

As you can see I have around 475 hours. I used to play with quite a lot of friends however this game is repetitve and boring. You will get your money back if you grind hard enough with in game drops. 

These are the reasons why I wouldn't recommend CSGO to anyone.
